name: GOL IBE Search Form
author: CEE Group Travelport a.s.

sections.description: This WP plugin is meant for GOL IBE users. It was built for easy integration of the GOL IBE Search into WP based website.
sections.installation:
Download the plugin from WordPress Plugin Directory at https://wordpress.org/plugins or upload the zip file into your WP plugins.
Make the plugin active.
Set up your GOL IBE domain name (usually youragencyname.golibe.com) and design of the search form in GOL IBE Search Form plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Who is this plugin meant for?
It’s meant for travel agencies using flight and hotel online booking tool – GOL IBE – developed by CEE Travel Systems (www.cee-systems.com).

How to set up look of the search form?
Open Settings through GOL IBE Search Form item shown as WP Settings menu sub-item. Here in GOL IBE Search Form settings you can customize colors, transparency, the domain of your GOL IBE website.

How to place the Search Form into the web page?
Add this shortcode [iforma-golibe] anywhere, where you want to show GOL IBE Search Form.
